channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024070633
item.description:
Report X-2024070633

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-09
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED WET PLACE INTO A HAZMAT BAG. THIS PACKAGE WAS LEAKING FROM LIDS. I THEN PLACE HAZMAT INTO A NEW HAZMAT BAG AND INTO A HAZMAY DRUM. SHIPPER NEED TO ENSURE THAT ALL LIDS ARE SEAL TIGHT BEFORE SHIPPING PACKAGES.
